name: HibVaccine(4DoseSchedule)Administered
title: Hib Vaccine (4 dose schedule) Administered
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent procedures for haemophilus influenzae type b (Hib) vaccine administration (4-dose schedule).),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Procedure, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with haemophilus influenzae type b (Hib) vaccine administration codes (4-dose schedule). This is a grouping of CPT and SNOMED CT codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
